response.overview: In today's blended families, boundary lines are sometimes blurred! New family members break the bonds of trust for their own manipulative pleasures! Poor, young Lexi gets seduced by the ones she trusted the most. The woman she has called Mother all her life, and the step-brother she has always loved.  Starring: Jodi West, Lexi Kartel, Levi Cash and Jimmy Legend.  2 hours of deceit and seductions...Including bonus Scenes!
response.tagline: A modern family saga about bigger love!
response.title: Blended & Twisted
